pages.text: $(li)The Redstone Charger is a variantion of the $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/flint_and_steel)Flint and Steel$(/l).$(br)$(li)Instead of producing fire, this one produces a quick redstone pulse.
$(li)This redstone pulse will last for about 1 second. If sneaking when right clicking though, the pulse will only last 1 redstone tick instead.
